gobblin.config.store.hdfs

Class SimpleLocalHDFSConfigStoreFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.config.store.hdfs.SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory
      • gobblin.config.store.hdfs.SimpleLocalHDFSConfigStoreFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigStoreFactory<SimpleHDFSConfigStore>

    public class SimpleLocalHDFSConfigStoreFactory
extends SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory
    Extension of SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory that creates a SimpleHDFSConfigStore which works for the local file system.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class gobblin.config.store.hdfs.SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory

        DEFAULT_CONFIG_NAMESPACE, DEFAULT_STORE_URI_KEY, HDFS_SCHEME_NAME, SIMPLE_HDFS_SCHEME_PREFIX

    • Method Detail

      • getPhysicalScheme

        protected String getPhysicalScheme()
        Description copied from class: SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory
        Returns the physical scheme this ConfigStoreFactory is responsible for. To support new HDFS FileSystem implementations, subclasses should override this method.
        Overrides:
        getPhysicalScheme in class SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory

      • getDefaultRootDir

        protected Path getDefaultRootDir()
        Description copied from class: SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory
        Gets a default root directory if one is not specified. The default root dir is /jobs/[current-user]/.
        Overrides:
        getDefaultRootDir in class SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory
